content: At range, he can also tear up a huge rock from the ground and throw your way, making him a threat even at a distance (though the rock flies pretty slow).
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Longevity Road'.
The content is as follows:
At range, he can also tear up a huge rock from the ground and throw your way, making him a threat even at a distance (though the rock flies pretty slow).
